title: Optimize a Multi-Stop Route
description: A driver has a load with three delivery stops. A dispatcher needs to sequence the stops to create the most efficient route.

tasks.description: Enter the locations of the three delivery stops into a route optimization tool.
The tool calculates the most efficient sequence for the stops based on road networks and expected traffic.
tasks.expected_outcome: An optimal stop sequence (e.g., B, then A, then C) is generated.

tasks.description: Send the optimized route and stop sequence to the driver.
tasks.expected_outcome: The driver receives the most efficient route to follow.
